text: @ScottGottliebMD @jaketapper Amazing this stuff is just happening now. The LATEST our govt found out about this was December 31st of last year (when China admitted there was a new coronavirus). And we had confirmed community spread in USA AT LEAST 3 months ago. Nice that we're just studying this stuff now.

entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19
